name: Rocket Racers (Deus Hephaestus)
description:
Race rocket powered aircraft in a deadly battle, where the fire from your engines will destroy your opponents, and your enemies' fire will destroy you!

Use the arrow keys to move.

Made for the JamGoJam JamDNA 2 Game Jam in 4 days.

Everything was done by me except for the sound, which was done by JonasMG.

Best played in full screen (button in the bottom right of the game).
